name: Altera DE1 Mp3 Recorder
tagline: "Portable Recorder" is a system made for the Altera DE1 board using Quartus 2 version 9.1 and VHDL and Verilog languages. The system can record and play back audio from the microphone or other external sources (PC, stereo, mp3 player).
